title: Season 8 New Forged runes and masteries.
body:
gunna keep it plain and simple as i was looking at the preview for this , and it was stated that some sort of refund would be given to those who bought runes in the previous runes,

What if we bought rune pages through RIOT POINTS, with hard earned money out of our pockets? would we be recieving these back

replies.body:
We will get a special 'rune page' icon :/

I really hope Riot decide to refund/compensate us in some way that is actually worth all that time grinding games for my runes.

I haven't used RP for my rune pages, does that mean I wouldn't be refunded anything?

I think when they said "more on how this will work later", they meant "more on how this will work later". 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Yeah ofc i get this, just hoping somone see's this and its properly thought about,
like i said because i payed real money to get plenty of rune pages i dont want anything but the RP i bought back when this comes into place,

I would imagine that purchases made using RP would be refunded for the RP used, rather than whatever is planned as compensation for the runes themselves (and any pages purchased with IP). It would make sense, since there's a fair bit of stuff that can be purchased with RP only and more keeps getting added to the list. Not to mention, there would be very few people who actually have everything that can be purchased with RP (that isn't able to be repetitively purchased). At the very least, I'd like Riot to go with something like this.

That said, it's entirely possible it may be something else entirely. All we can do at this point is speculate on what the compensation may be.
